description.displayText:
I hired Quesia as a nanny for my newborn starting at 12 weeks (7 weeks adjusted). She has been a godsend... she is very calm, caring and positive with our baby and we're still working with her 1+ months later. 
She reads, does tummy time, practices baby's hand reflexes, takes her out for walks, and speaks Spanish to her. We plan to keep working with her so feel free to book her... just not on our days!! ;) ;)

description.displayText: Quesia has been watching out 11 month old baby for a few weeks now and she is just wonderful! She is quite dependable and is flexible with my work schedule. By daughter really adores her. I look forward to a long term established relationship and would definitely hire her again!!
description.originalText: Quesia has been watching out 11 month old baby for a few weeks now and she is just wonderful! She is quite dependable and is flexible with my work schedule. By daughter really adores her. I look forward to a long term established relationship and would definitely hire her again!!

description.displayText: I am so happy I found Quesia when we needed a last-minute child care for my 6 months old baby. I had to find someone after 7pm for the next day and Quesia responded quickly and that was a life saver! She immediately bonded with my son and he stayed content and happy throughout the day. After I told her our kids are in Spanish dual language, she incorporated Spanish and started talking to my son in Spanish, which we thought was really cool. She sang for the baby, did stretches, patiently fed all baby food that I prepared. Thanks to Quesia, my husband and I could focus on work from home. She's very flexible, independent and reliable. Thank you Quesia abs we look forward to having you to our house again!
